example_sentence_italian: La piazza è il cuore della città.
example_sentence_english: The square is the heart of the city.

notes: partitive plural; contraction of di + le

example_sentence_italian: Il nome della piazza è antico.
example_sentence_english: The name of the square is old.
We are going to the main square.

example_sentence_italian: Ci sono concerti alle piazze cittadine.
example_sentence_english: There are concerts at the city squares.
I left from the square this morning.
I arrive from the crowded squares.
I will wait for you in the square.
Markets take place in the squares.
There is a statue on the square.
I have information about the historic squares.

example_sentence_italian: Organizziamo un evento con la piazza.
example_sentence_english: We organize an event with the square.
We collaborate with the local squares.
